700948f-a.text:
East Tremont Ave., east side, between Puritan and Mayflower Aves., showing (successively) the Cardo Bros., G. Palumbo, and F. Colino marble yards. The view is in a southerly direction from Whittemore
Ave.
July 9, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
700948f-a.folder: Tremont Avenue (East & Puritan Avenue, Bronx, NY
